title.narrative: FBS (Family Budget and Savings) Life Project

description.narrative:
Le but est de sensibiliser les communautés les plus pauvres des bidonvilles urbains de Manille, Baseco et Tondo, à la préservation de l’environnement et au changement climatique.
ENFANCE FBS LIFE Project will promote awareness on environmental conservation and knowledge on how to mitigate and reduce risk on the effects of climate change. The project is a one stop shop that will start with awareness campaign to encourage advocacy with giving value to the environment and be invovled in development of Mangrove Eco-sytem near the coast line of Baseco. Another part of the project is related on the capacity building and training practicum for validation that will link to livelihood from the eco-waste through recycling and composting. Utilization of water hyacinth to produce slippers, bags; plastic wrappers to be created as valuable wallets. Composting of bio-degradable waste and convert into organic fertilizer to be used for urban gardening and for the mangroves eco-system. Community organizing to become association, cooperative that would produce and sell products from eco-waste. Finally, facilitation of small eco-trade fair that beneficiaries will have the opportunity to linked the market and start to estblish marketing and linkages.

participating-org.narrative: Service de Coopération et d'Action Culturelle
